title: The Martial Arts Academy
description: The Martial Arts Academy is a client-side web application. It provides information about martial arts classes and instructors, allowing instructors to browse and create new classes. The application features a responsive and user-friendly interface.
technologies: React.js, React Router, AOS, React Responsive Carousel, React Awesome Reveal, react-router-dom, firebase, sweetalert2, react-tooltip, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, and more.

title: Findus Toys
description: This is a 'Baby Toys' related website. Here in the- On top have a Nab Bar with Company name, Home, All Toys, Blog, Rigistration and Sign In options. In NavBar also have My Toys, Add A Toy, Log Out, Profile Photo which will show if user logged In. In the View Toy page has a 'See all toys' button. Clicking this button will redirect to all toys page. The application features a responsive and user-friendly interface.
technologies: React.js, vite, firebase, react-rating, react-tabs, sweetalert2 Tailwind CSS, mongoDB and more.

title: Special JP CHEF
description: This is a 'Japanese Food and Chef' related website. Here in the- Up options. In NavBar also have Log Out, Profile Photo and Email which will show if user logged In. In the View Recipes page has a 'Favoroute' button. Clicking this button will show a toste with a meassage and button will disabled. The application features a responsive and user-friendly interface.
technologies: React.js, React Router, react-lazyload, react-pdf, react-rating, Tailwind CSS and more.
